Traits.Name: Spectral Apparition
Traits.Content: The Hound of Dead can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Traits.Name: Omen of Calamity
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 feet of the Hound of Dead have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hound of Dead makes four attacks: one with Bite and three with Spectral Claw.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be afflicted with the poisoned condition until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Spectral Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Wail of the Damned
Actions.Content: The Hound of Dead emits a mournful wail. Each creature of the Houndâ€™s choice within 30 feet must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 30 (4d12 + 4) necrotic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is not stunned. This action can be used once per long rest.
